Name: Tea
Description: It smells delicious. This would surely give you a boost.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Huele delicioso. Esto seguramente le dará un impulso.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 아주 기분좋은 향이 납니다. 이것은 확실히 너에게 힘을 줄 겁니다..
DescriptionLocalization.de: Es riecht lecker. Dies würde dir sicherlich einen Schub geben.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Cheiro delicioso. Isso certamente lhe daria energia.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Вкусно пахнет и наверняка приободрит Вас.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 茶。闻起来很香。这肯定会使你健步如飞。
